column4: I am interested in changing the icons of a few folders to custom icons.  Can someone please assist me?
Right-click on folder, options. There You can change the icon of the folder.
Thank you!  I did not see that option earlier.  I will clean my glasses and look again.
I do not see "options" as an option.  I do have "properties", but I see no where in the tabs to point to an icon file.
